This page creates an inline badge similar to <nowiki>{{ptag2}}</nowiki> with the name "phabricator-project" and the specified project name (first parameter). Unlike {{tl|ptag2}}, which appears as a separate paragraph, this template shows the tag inside the paragraph.

Example "Foo" used on this page.
:<nowiki>Please report Visual Editor bugs using the tag {{Phabricator inline tag|VisualEditor}}.</nowiki>
Please report Visual Editor bugs using the tag {{Phabricator inline tag|VisualEditor}}.
